No Poverty.reason: The course focuses on property law and civil law principles without addressing poverty or social welfare directly.

Zero Hunger.reason: There is no content related to hunger or food security.

Good Health and Well-being.reason: The course does not cover health, medicine, or well-being topics.

Quality Education.reason: As a required law course, it provides structured learning on civil property law, contributing significantly to higher education and legal competency.

Gender Equality.reason: The syllabus does not explicitly address gender equality issues.

Clean Water and Sanitation.reason: No mention of water or sanitation issues.

Affordable and Clean Energy.reason: Energy topics are not covered in the curriculum.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: Understanding property law may indirectly support economic activity and legal practice, minor relevance.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: The course covers legal principles relevant to property, which may indirectly relate to infrastructure regulation, minor relevance.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: Property law can influence social equity, but the course does not explicitly address inequality.

Sustainable Cities and Communities.reason: Legal knowledge on property may support urban planning indirectly, but it is not a primary focus.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: The course does not discuss sustainability or consumption practices.

Climate Action.reason: Environmental or climate-related topics are not included.

Life Below Water.reason: No relevance; course content does not include aquatic ecosystems or marine law.

Life on Land.reason: Only minor indirect relevance via property rights affecting land use, but environmental aspects are not covered.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: Civil law and property law are foundational for legal systems and governance, contributing moderately to justice and strong institutions.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course does not engage in international collaboration or partnerships related to SDGs.
